sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowRight, CheckCircle, Play, Brain, Palette, Code2, Search, Server, Megaphone, Code, ShoppingCart, Users, Layout, Headphones, ArrowUpRight } from 'lucide-react'; import useScrollAnimation from '../hooks/useScrollAnimation'; const Home = () => { useScrollAnimation(); const offerings = [ { title: 'Development', description: 'Pixel-perfect engineering across modern stacks and workflows.', icon: Code }, { title: 'Woo Commerce', description: 'High-converting storefronts tailored for memorable shopping journeys.', icon: ShoppingCart }, { title: 'CRM Solutions', description: 'Customer experience platforms that centralize insights for success.', icon: Users }, { title: 'Web Design', description: 'Vibrant, intuitive, and minimal digital expressions of your brand.', icon: Layout }, { title: 'IT Support', description: 'Always-on experts ready to troubleshoot and optimize your systems.', icon: Headphones, tag: 'Free!' } ]; const brandLogos = [ { name: 'Netflix', logo: '/brands/netflix.svg' }, { name: 'Apple Music', logo: '/brands/apple-music.svg' }, { name: 'Amazon', logo: '/brands/amazon.svg' }, { name: 'Spotify', logo: '/brands/spotify.svg' }, { name: 'Google', logo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/google.com' }, { name: 'Microsoft', logo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/microsoft.com' }, { name: 'Adobe', logo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/adobe.com' }, { name: 'Salesforce', logo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/salesforce.com' }, { name: 'IBM', logo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/ibm.com' }, { name: 'Oracle', logo: 'https://logo.clearbit.com/oracle.com' } ]; const consultingHighlights = [ '24/7 Full Service Support', 'Immediate Response', 'Easy to approach us' ]; const caseStudies = [ { name: 'Development', badgePrimary: 'Web Development', badgeSecondary: 'Mobile Development', imagePrimary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517433456452-f9633a875f6f?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', imageSecondary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522202176988-66273c2fd55f?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', description: 'Software development is a dynamic and rapidly evolving field that shapes the digital landscape. We design, create, deploy, and maintain modern applications and systems.' }, { name: 'Woo Commerce', badgePrimary: 'Storefront Design', badgeSecondary: 'Conversion Optimization', imagePrimary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1545239351-1141bd82e8a6?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', imageSecondary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1441986300917-64674bd600d8?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', description: 'We build immersive WooCommerce experiences that balance brand storytelling with intuitive purchasing journeys and robust integrations.' }, { name: 'CRM Solutions', badgePrimary: 'Customer Insights', badgeSecondary: 'Automation Pipelines', imagePrimary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556740749-887f6717d7e4?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', imageSecondary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1587614382346-ac6c4593abfc?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', description: 'Our CRM programs unify sales, service, and marketing data to power personalization and operational efficiency across touchpoints.' }, { name: 'Web Designing', badgePrimary: 'Brand Systems', badgeSecondary: 'Prototype Labs', imagePrimary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1523475472560-d2df97ec485c?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', imageSecondary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1498050108023-c5249f4df085?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', description: 'We pair design thinking with motion, accessibility, and consistent UI systems to craft standout digital destinations.' }, { name: 'IT Support', badgePrimary: 'Managed Services', badgeSecondary: 'Security Operations', imagePrimary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1525182008055-f88b95ff7980?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', imageSecondary: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1518770660439-4636190af475?auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80', description: 'Our 24/7 IT support covers proactive monitoring, rapid incident response, and lifecycle management for hybrid infrastructures.' } ]; const [activeCase, setActiveCase] = useState(caseStudies[0]); const handleCaseChange = (nextCase) => { if (nextCase.name === activeCase.name) return; setActiveCase(nextCase); }; const consultingSteps = [ { title: 'Discovery and Analysis', description: "Perform an analysis of the client's existing IT systems." }, { title: 'Tailored Solutions', description: 'Develop IT solutions based on the analysis phase.' }, { title: 'Deployment and Support', description: 'Regularly communicate with our client to any concern.' } ]; const processSteps = [ { title: 'Brainstorming Ideas', description: 'Collaborative discovery sessions to surface high-impact opportunities.', icon: Brain }, { title: 'Product Design', description: 'Design systems and prototypes that align brand, UX, and business goals.', icon: Palette }, { title: 'Front-End Development', description: 'Interfaces engineered for performance, accessibility, and delight.', icon: Code2 }, { title: 'SEO Optimization', description: 'Data-driven improvements that help your product stay visible and competitive.', icon: Search }, { title: 'Back-End Development', description: 'Robust, scalable services architected for security and reliability.', icon: Server }, { title: 'Digital Marketing', description: 'Launch strategies that extend reach and drive measurable growth.', icon: Megaphone } ]; const portfolioGrid = [ { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515165562835-c4c9e91731e0?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', title: 'Fintech Dashboard Redesign', description: 'Modernized analytics suite that increased daily active users by 42% for a global bank.' }, { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556740749-887f6717d7e4?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', title: 'E-commerce Expansion', description: 'Headless commerce build driving 3x revenue lift and omnichannel customer journeys.' }, { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1573164714086-1a9c79d5ae36?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', title: 'Healthcare Telemedicine', description: 'HIPAA-compliant virtual care platform scaling to 1M+ monthly appointments.' }, { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1531297484001-80022131f5a1?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', title: 'SaaS Workflow Automation', description: 'AI copilots and integrations that shaved 35% off manual operations for enterprises.' }, { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515378791036-0648a3ef77b2?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', title: 'EdTech Learning Hub', description: 'Adaptive classroom experiences supporting personalized learning paths worldwide.' }, { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1545239351-1141bd82e8a6?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', title: 'Retail Loyalty Platform', description: 'Unified loyalty ecosystem with real-time offers and customer insights.' }, { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1550751827-4bd374c3f58b?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', title: 'Smart City Operations', description: 'IoT command center orchestrating utilities, mobility, and public services.' }, { image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1573497491208-6b1acb260507?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80', title: 'Corporate Brand Refresh', description: 'Enterprise website overhaul amplifying story, conversion, and accessibility.' } ]; const teamFeatures = [ { title: 'Diverse Expertise', description: 'Seasoned engineers, designers, and strategists collaborate to tackle complex challenges across industries.' }, { title: 'Collaborative Culture', description: 'Transparent communication and cross-functional squads keep delivery fast, focused, and consistent.' }, { title: 'Customer-Centric Approach', description: 'Every engagement starts with discovery, aligning business goals with user needs for measurable outcomes.' }, { title: 'Passion for Excellence', description: 'Continuous improvement and rigorous QA ensure every release meets enterprise-grade expectations.' }, { title: 'Empowered Learning', description: 'Mentorship, guilds, and skill-building programs keep our teams sharp on emerging technologies.' }, { title: 'Innovation and Creativity', description: 'Ideation sprints and rapid prototyping unlock breakthrough solutions tailored to your roadmap.' } ]; const showcaseHighlights = [ 'Managed services and products', 'Flexibility and adaptability', 'Competitive advantage' ]; const portfolioShowcase = [ { title: 'E-commerce platform development', caption: 'Global retail reimagined', background: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556740749-887f6717d7e4?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80', thumbnail: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1529927066849-43bd0aae88b0?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80', theme: 'dark' }, { title: 'SaaS integration suite', caption: 'Unified experience across cloud tools', background: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1523475472560-d2df97ec485c?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80', thumbnail: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1526662092594-e98c1e356d6a?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80', theme: 'light' }, { title: 'Mobile platform development', caption: 'Intuitive journeys on every device', background: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512499617640-c2f999018b72?auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=80', thumbnail: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1598327105666-5b89351aff97?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80', theme: 'light' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{/* Front */}

))}
{/* Featured Logos */}

{/* Process Section */}

Learn More
{processSteps.map((step, index) => { const Icon = step.icon; return (
{index + 1 < 10 ? `0${index + 1}` : index + 1}

{step.title}

{step.description}

); })}
{/* Offerings Section */}

What we're offering

Dealing in all professional IT services.

One fundamental aspect of IT services is infrastructure management. This involves the design, implementation, and maintenance of the hardware, software, networks, and servers.

{offerings.map((item) => { const Icon = item.icon; return (
{item.tag && ( {item.tag} )}

{item.title}

); })}
{/* Case Studies Section */}

Case Studies

Detailing of our products

{/* Consulting Excellence Section */}
Consulting Excellence

Best pathway to our clients.

Our consulting process begins with a thorough assessment of your current IT infrastructure, workflows, and pain points.

{/* Team Strength Section */}
Features

Boosting your business using our team

Our teams are a melting pot of diverse expertise and perspectives. From seasoned industry specialists to emerging talent, every member brings a unique set of experiences that elevate your initiatives.

); }; export default Home;
